author: mandrenguyen
body:
As discussed in #19470 the Run 2 heavy-ion reco workflows were migrated to use the Run2_2016 era.  Since we didn't use the HI reco in 2016, this doesn't make much sense. 
This PR removes Run2_2016 from the era.
title: Roll back era for early Run 2 heavy-ion relval worflow
